title: Braian Mendes Portfolio
subtitle: Modern, accessible, and filterable portfolio built with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS
description: Personal portfolio built with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS. Showcases my projects, certifications, recommended books, and blog posts. Features advanced filtering, responsive and accessible UI, and a modern developer experience.
overview: A modern, performant, and accessible portfolio to present my work, learning journey, and thoughts on software engineering. Includes sections for projects, certifications, books, blog, and about.
howItWorks: Visitors can browse and filter projects, certifications, and books.
Each section provides detailed information and links.
Blog and documentation sections for sharing knowledge and guides.
Responsive and theme-aware UI for all devices.
features: Dark/Light Mode: Toggle between themes for comfortable viewing.
Responsive Design: Fully optimized for desktop and mobile.
Accessible UI: Built with accessibility best practices.
Interactive Filtering: Easily find projects, books, or certificates by tags, tools, area, year, or institution.
Modern Animations: Smooth transitions and UI feedback.
mainSections: Projects: Curated list of software projects with filtering and search.
Certifications: Professional certifications, filterable by area, year, and institution.
Books: Recommended books with filters and personal notes.
Blog: Articles and studies on technology and career (coming soon).
About: Information about my background and passion for software engineering.
limitations: Blog and documentation sections are under construction.
Continuously evolving with new features and content.
